newsArray.title: India Defeat UAE By 78 Runs in Women's Asia Cup T20 2024; Harmanpreet Kaur, Richa Ghosh Help Women in Blue Close in On Semifinal Berth
newsArray.description: India produced a memorable batting performance, reaching the mark of 200 in T20Is for the first time. They target of 202 set by India was too steep to climb for UAE and they collapsed on 123/7, handing India a 78-run victory. With this win, India have unofficially booked their place in the semifinal.

newsArray.title: Hardik Pandya Dons A Smile As He Makes First Public Appearance After Divorce With Natasa Stankovic
creator: ABP News Bureau
newsArray.description: Hardik Pandya First Public Appearance After Divorce With Natasa Stankovic: Hardik Pandya, the star India all-rounder, made his first public apperance on Saturday (July 20) after confirming his divorce with Natasa Stankovic. Notably, Hardik and Natasa shared a joint-statement on Instagram in which they confirmed their separation."After 4 years of being together, Hardik and I have decided to mutually part ways. We tried our best together and gave it our all, and we believe this is in the best interest for the both of us. This was a tough decision for us to make, given the joy, mutual respect and companionship we enjoyed together and as we grew a family," a statement released on their Instagram read.Hardik Pandya's latest picture at an event.- The pain behind his smiles, the pain in his eyes. üíî pic.twitter.com/anCJ1m1GdE‚Äî Tanuj Singh (@ImTanujSingh) July 21, 2024READ HERE | Hardik Pandya-Natasa Stankovic Divorce: Collective Net Worth Of Ex-Couple"We are blessed with Agastya, who will continue to be at the centre of both our lives and we will co-parent to ensure that we give him everything that we can for his happiness. We sincerely request your support and understanding to give us privacy during this difficult and sensitive time," it added.Hardik Pandya Wears A Smile In His First Public AppearanceHardik, who broke down in tears after bowling the last over of India's epic T20 World Cup 2024 final triumph against South Africa, was seen wearing a smile during his first public apperance after the confirmation of their divorce. Hardik made this appearance as he launched his first activewear brand at an event.ALSO READ | Suryakumar Yadav's First Instagram Post After Being Named India's T20I Captain Goes ViralThe star India all-rounder was Rohit's deputy during their victorious T20 World Cup triumph, he was not trusted to replace Rohit after he announced his retirement fron T20Is. It was Suryakumar Yadav who has been named India's T20I skipper with Shubman Gill named the vice-captain.
